amendment.description: To eliminate a certain increase in funding.

action.text: SA 764 fell when the Chair ruled the amendment non-germane.
Amendment SA 764 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 764.
Amendment SA 764 proposed by Senator Blunt for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6751; text: CR S6751) To eliminate a certain increase in funding.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 764 proposed by Senator Blunt for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 738.
